languages.text: "Берем!" {n}Глаза Джай горят азартом картежника, вытянувшего козырь.{/n} "Мы же берем его, шерин? Лишний флагман — и почти даром..."

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Берем!" {n}Глаза Джай горят азартом картежника, вытянувшего козырь.{/n} "Мы же берем его, шерин? Лишний флагман — и почти даром..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "We'll take it!" {n}Jae's eyes light up with the excitement of a gambler who has just drawn a trump card.{/n} "We are taking it, aren't we, shereen? It's a whole extra flagship, and practically for free..."
languages.original_text: "Берем!" {n}Глаза Джай горят азартом картежника, вытянувшего козырь.{/n} "Мы же берем его, шерин? Лишний флагман — и почти даром..."

traits.locale_text: "We'll take it!" {n}Jae's eyes light up with the excitement of a gambler who has just picked up a trump card.{/n} "We are taking it, aren't we, shereen? It's a whole extra flagship, and practically for free..."

"We'll take it!" {n}Jae's eyes light up with the excitement of a gambler who has just drawn a trump card.{/n} "We are taking it, aren't we, shereen? It's a whole extra flagship, and practically for free..."

languages.text: "Wir nehmen es!" {n}Jaes Augen leuchten vor Aufregung, wie bei einer Kartenspielerin, die gerade einen Trumpf gezogen hat.{/n} "Wir nehmen es doch, nicht wahr, Shereen? Ein zusätzliches Flaggschiff, und das fast umsonst ..."
languages.original_text: "We'll take it!" {n}Jae's eyes light up with the excitement of a gambler who has just drawn a trump card.{/n} "We are taking it, aren't we, shereen? It's a whole extra flagship, and practically for free..."

traits.locale_text: "Wir nehmen es!" {n}Jaes Augen leuchten vor Aufregung, wie bei einer Kartenspielerin, die gerade einen Trumpf gezogen hat.{/n} "Wir nehmen es doch, nicht wahr, Shereen? Ein zusätzliches Flaggschiff, und das fast umsonst ..."

languages.text: {n}L'excitation qui brille dans les yeux de Jae rappelle celle d'un joueur qui vient de tirer un atout.{/n} « On le prend ! N'est-ce pas, shereen ? Un nouveau vaisseau amiral dont on nous fait pratiquement cadeau, ça ne se refuse pas... »
languages.original_text: "We'll take it!" {n}Jae's eyes light up with the excitement of a gambler who has just drawn a trump card.{/n} "We are taking it, aren't we, shereen? It's a whole extra flagship, and practically for free..."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'excitation qui brille dans les yeux de Jae rappelle celle d'un joueur qui vient de tirer un atout.{/n} « On le prend ! N'est-ce pas, shereen ? Un nouveau vaisseau amiral dont on nous fait pratiquement cadeau, ça ne se refuse pas... »

languages.text: “这艘船归我们啦！”{n}婕伊双眼闪闪发光，仿佛刚刚抽到必胜王牌的赌徒一样。{/n}“这艘船确实要归我们了，是吧，亲爱的？相当于一艘额外的旗舰，差不多一分钱都没花……”
languages.original_text: "We'll take it!" {n}Jae's eyes light up with the excitement of a gambler who has just drawn a trump card.{/n} "We are taking it, aren't we, shereen? It's a whole extra flagship, and practically for free..."

traits.locale_text: “这艘船归我们啦！”{n}婕伊双眼闪闪发光，仿佛刚刚抽到必胜王牌的赌徒一样。{/n}“这艘船确实要归我们了，是吧，亲爱的？相当于一艘额外的旗舰，差不多一分钱都没花……”

languages.text: «¡Nos la llevamos!». {n}Los ojos de Jae se iluminan con la ilusión de una adicta al juego que acaba de robar un comodín.{/n} «Nos la llevamos, ¿no, shereen? Es una nave insignia entera, prácticamente gratis...».
languages.original_text: "We'll take it!" {n}Jae's eyes light up with the excitement of a gambler who has just drawn a trump card.{/n} "We are taking it, aren't we, shereen? It's a whole extra flagship, and practically for free..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Nos la llevamos!». {n}Los ojos de Jae se iluminan con la ilusión de una adicta al juego que acaba de robar un comodín.{/n} «Nos la llevamos, ¿no, shereen? Es una nave insignia entera, prácticamente gratis...».

languages.text: 「いただき！」{n}ジェイの目が、切り札を引き当てたギャンブラーのように輝いた。{/n}「これ、もらうんだよね？シェリーン。旗艦まるごともう一隻だし、ほとんどタダみたいなもんだし…」
languages.original_text: "We'll take it!" {n}Jae's eyes light up with the excitement of a gambler who has just drawn a trump card.{/n} "We are taking it, aren't we, shereen? It's a whole extra flagship, and practically for free..."

traits.locale_text: 「いただき！」{n}ジェイの目が、切り札を引き当てたギャンブラーのように輝いた。{/n}「これ、もらうんだよね？シェリーン。旗艦まるごともう一隻だし、ほとんどタダみたいなもんだし…」

languages.text: "Alıyoruz!" {n}Jae'ın gözleri, koz çekmiş bir kumarbaz heyecanıyla parlıyor.{/n} "Alıyoruz, değil mi şirinim? Koskoca bir sancak gemisi daha, hem de neredeyse bedavaya..."
languages.original_text: "We'll take it!" {n}Jae's eyes light up with the excitement of a gambler who has just drawn a trump card.{/n} "We are taking it, aren't we, shereen? It's a whole extra flagship, and practically for free..."

traits.locale_text: "Alıyoruz!" {n}Jae'ın gözleri, koz çekmiş bir kumarbaz heyecanıyla parlıyor.{/n} "Alıyoruz, değil mi şirinim? Koskoca bir sancak gemisi daha, hem de neredeyse bedavaya..."

languages.original_text: "We'll take it!" {n}Jae's eyes light up with the excitement of a gambler who has just drawn a trump card.{/n} "We are taking it, aren't we, shereen? It's a whole extra flagship, and practically for free..."
